title: RanShuo_Sherry
author: RanShuo_Sherry
content: Hello everyone  BTCI am a collection machine supplier from China,I have created a telegram channel, which will update the prices of mining equipment from China every dayIf you are interested, you can follow me. Thank you very much.https://t.me/RanShuo_Graphic

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: This supposed to be in service discussion as you have a service to offer. Your Bitcointalk account was registered today at 03:25:06 AM and you posted this today at 03:44:55 AM. That was not up to 20 minutes when you registered your account that you posted this.No professional work than a kind of writeup that scammers are commonly using. No advise than people should avoid you.

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Quote from: RanShuo_Sherry on October 18, 2023, 03:44:58 AMHello everyone  BTCI am a collection machine supplier from China,I have created a telegram channel, which will update the prices of mining equipment from China every dayIf you are interested, you can follow me. Thank you very much.https://t.me/RanShuo_GraphicI thought you were giving the price signals from China only. But after checking your channel, it seems you are also selling GPUs. Forum members are unlikely to buy any GPUs or anything from a newbie without using an escrow service. Moreover, you did not mention in your post that you are selling GPUs in your telegram channel. If I am not wrong, most GPUs are not profitable enough to mine coins now. So, why would people buy GPUs as mining gear unless they want to play with it? I guess those are used GPU, and those were used to mine coins. So, I don't think those cards will give the best gaming performance.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I think you better need to make a good reputation first here in the forum before you try promoting something to sell related to Miner just like offordscott do because we can't trust a newbie dealing outside this forum without trusted escrow is pretty risky to deal with, there are many scammers on telegram if you are not one of these scammers why not start selling units on Computer hardware section with escrow to build a reputation here.

comments.author: KiaKia
comments.body: I so use aliexpress to buy some GPU's for mining and also some basic miners, but OP I am not so sure that I will buy such expensive things from you, because you are a newbie, I have my way to making contacts on aliexpress and it's very easy but I can't trust you because you have no past reviews from customers you sold some goods to. If your products are available on alibaba or aliexpress you should give is the name of your store I will look into it and see what's up but a newbie account telling us that he is a suppliers from china? You should know that both of these websites have escrow ways of releasing funds to seller after buyer get their goods in the same china, if not you can always get your refund from the website customer care but how is that going to work here? As a matter of fact you got nothing to lose, there isn't anything stopping you from taking cash and running away as you can always open a brand new account again.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: The best thing right now is to build a reputation but it takes time, so I suggest you post your stuff on a marketplace like ebay or aliexpress those marketplaces can act as an escrow for the buyer. and can used as a display for your stuff. not just your account is new but also your telegram channel also new so no wonder people dont believe you right now

comments.author: AniZZ
comments.body: Quote from: RanShuo_Sherry on October 18, 2023, 03:44:58 AMHello everyone  BTCI am a collection machine supplier from China,I have created a telegram channel, which will update the prices of mining equipment from China every dayIf you are interested, you can follow me. Thank you very much.https://t.me/RanShuo_GraphicGreat! I'll definitely take a look at your project!

comments.author: RanShuo_Sherry
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on October 18, 2023, 10:22:10 AMI think you better need to make a good reputation first here in the forum before you try promoting something to sell related to Miner just like offordscott do because we can't trust a newbie dealing outside this forum without trusted escrow is pretty risky to deal with, there are many scammers on telegram if you are not one of these scammers why not start selling units on Computer hardware section with escrow to build a reputation here.Thanks for your advice, I will learn

comments.author: Z390
comments.body: OP, have you ever sold miners to people before? Can you show such proof? Since you are from China I believe you must be available on aliexpress, I mean your store? Can you drop link to that? If people are going to patronize you they will need assurance that they are not dealing with a scammer, asic miners are too costly to buy anyhow.
